content: I'm in Vietnam watching @Raymond Francis Sarmiento (from Philipines) talking about this: https://rxbox.chits.ph/what_is_rxbox/. It's a pretty cool device and it has a FHIR interface - well done Raymond
now, to get Raymond to a connectathon....

Thank you for the kind words, @Grahame Grieve. As of present time, 2 electronic medical record systems can now connect with the RxBox (https://rxbox.chits.ph) and we are looking to get more connected. Yes, I would love to attend a connectathon! :)
